fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Organization Member Activity Summary
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to aggregate member activity at the organization level with filtering.

InputDefinition.userMessage: For each organization with 5 or more member employees, show me the organization name, member count, and their combined event and course activity. Display as a table ranked by total activity. Let me click on an organization to see who the members are and their individual activity.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes a table of organizations filtered to those with 5+ members
Organization name and member count are shown
Combined event and course activity metrics are displayed
Organizations are ranked by activity level
Only qualifying organizations (5+ members) are included
Clicking organization shows member list with individual activity metrics
Member table allows opening individual member records
